DOC.brief_summary: Women undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) therapy , low responder agree enter trial randomize study group , embryo transfer do day oocyte aspiration fertilization ; control group embryo transfer perform 48 72 hour later , current accept practice .
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Timing For Embryo Transfer For Low Responder Patients
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo IVF Number mature oocytes equal less maximum number embryo intend transfer Patient consent
